name: m365-content-based-permission-recommendations
title: This prompt ensures that permissions are dynamically adjusted based on the content's nature
shortDescription: Ask copilot to recommend permissions based on the content's nature
longDescription: This prompt will help you to ensure that permissions are dynamically adjusted based on the content's nature. This will help you to ensure that the right people have access to the right content at the right time.

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot to recommend permissions based on the content's nature
